Author: NeutralSmithHotel
Text: Yep... I totally agree. WE all fall down sometimes... everyone does. Even the person you are thinking of who is "perfect"... he or she falls. What matters honestly is picking yourself up--I know this might positiveity might be triggering some vomiting... I'm sorry about that :).   Seriously though... your ED loves that black and white thinking. Fight that bitch and remember that you are awesome :)

Author: greycat91
Text: I needed this❤️ I tried relaxing and eating normally and I swear my face is already bloated and my stomach is sticking out. I know my family is just happy I ate but my mom ate less than me and it has me all in my head
